add-medicine.Subtitle: Fill in the details below and save a new medicine record.
add-medicine.BarcodeHelp: Scan with a barcode scanner or click the icon to use your camera.
add-medicine.NameHelp: Use the official or trade name that staff will recognize.
add-medicine.PriceHelp: Selling price per unit. Will auto-format on blur.
add-medicine.WeightHelp: Add the strength or net content if applicable.
add-medicine.ManufacturerHelp: Optional. Company that produced the medicine.
add-medicine.OriginHelp: Optional. Country where it was manufactured.
add-medicine.PurchaseHelp: Optional. Internal note for where/price you purchased.
add-medicine.CategoryHelp: Used to group medicines for filtering and reporting.
add-medicine.UnitHelp: Packaging or sale units (e.g., piece, box, bottle).
add-medicine.PhotoHelp: Optional. JPG or PNG up to a few MB.
add-medicine.DetailPh: Add usage notes, common brand names, storage, etc.
add-medicine.DetailHelp: Optional. Helpful internal notes or public description.
